name: Storage Bags
pages: Bags allows you to quickly collect unstackable items in your inventory. There are 2 kinds: Equipment bags collecting everything that has durability, and book bags collecting enchantment books.$(br2)Bags can store up to 64 items, but they don't have GUIs. In inventory, left click bag with item to store. Right click bag to take item out.

pages.text: Features:$(li)Bag Collect: Right click to store matching items in inventory, other than hotbar.$(li)Bag Extract: Shift + right click to throw out stored items. Throws up to 16 at a time.$(li)Double click to collect matching items.$(li)$(l:mechanics/chest)Load / Dump with Chest$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/quick_insert)Quick Insert$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/drawer_quickmove)Bag Quick Move$(/l)$(li)$(l:mechanics/pickup)Recursive Pickup$(/l)
